## Proposal
Describe the enhancement in 2–4 sentences.

## Goal (what this improves)
What reviewer outcome does this support?
- ☐ Faster recruiter understanding
- ☐ Stronger audit-safe traceability
- ☐ Clearer financial logic / governance control
- ☐ Better executive reporting artifact
- ☐ Stronger evidence pack

## Scope boundaries (must remain true)
Confirm the enhancement stays within scope:
- ☐ Governance + analysis only (no implied admin authority)
- ☐ No employer data, no production billing exports
- ☐ Evidence remains sanitized or clearly labeled as personal lab
- ☐ No “tool cosplay” or inflated claims

## Proposed deliverables (artifacts)
List files to be added/updated (paths matter).
- `...`
- `...`

## Evidence plan
What evidence will support this?
- ☐ Screenshot(s)
- ☐ Sample table(s)
- ☐ Decision log entry
- ☐ Evidence index updates
- ☐ Assumptions + scope note updates

## Acceptance criteria (definition of done)
What must be true for this to be complete?
- ☐ Links resolve (no 404s)
- ☐ Evidence artifacts are indexed and clickable
- ☐ Output is readable by non-technical reviewers
- ☐ Repo tone remains calm, analytical, business-first

## Notes (optional)
Add any constraints, references, or context.
